name: The Berry Company Pomegranate Juice
description: Native to Persia, this powerhouse super fruit is not only good for you, but it is great tasting too. It has a light and delicate flavour, making it perfect to serve over ice, mix in with your morning smoothie or even blend in cocktail. This all-rounder is a staple in every household. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
